title: How to make my handwriting neat and still write quickly - Quora
tags: Tips and Hacks for Everyday Life

response.answer_text: First, you sloooowly write a “q” Now, take a deep breath and write a “u” Wait a beat and write an “i” Just kidding, sort of. ;-) Practice neat writing as slowly as necessary. Practice, practice, practice. A little bit faster, now (to quote an ancient song). You understand the process. It’s all about practice and slowly getting faster.

Forget quick. Write your best. Speed comes later. You have to know exactly what you are going to write in order to put it down faster. So the speed barrier actually is two-fold, letter formation and information. Practice brings the handwriting up to a certain level, but accurately putting down that information is a separate component.
